:::{#about}

Nikolas started his PhD in October 2021 and is Co-Supervised by Christian Baumgartner and Matthias Hein. He is mainly focusing on the creation of robust ML-methods for medical image analysis, for which physical informed networks could be of relevance. 
Prior to that he worked at a ML-Research department at SAP and as a quantitative consultant at d-fine.
